summary: This mod allows you to run custom scripts by casting a spell.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to run custom scripts by casting a spell. The Custom Script Spell will be added to the play when you load up the mod and when you cast the spell you can select which Script to run. To edit these scripts open you will need to use the Creation Kit and load up the Custom Script Spell.esm and then under Object Window->Characters->Quest find open the aaaCustomScriptSpell# and under the Script tab are the custom scripts. You will need to know Papyrus which is the scripting language for Skyrim in order to understand this mod. Also if you play Oblivion check out myÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/47247?]Oblivion Custom Script Ring[/url]. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1029/?]here[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
Creation Kit

Installing
To install just download then extract folder and drag master file, bsa and scripts folder into your data folder. Make sure in the Data Files Load Order that Custom Script Spell.esm is after Skyrim.esm and after any Skyrim DLCs.
author: LegoManIAm94
